data.name: Blinded
data.mechanic: Fails checks that require sight. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage. Creature has disadvantage when attacking.

data.name: Charmed
data.mechanic: Can't attack the charmer. Charmer has advantage on social ability checks.

data.name: Frightened
data.mechanic: Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls against the source of its fear. Can't willingly moved closer to the source of its fear.

data.name: Frozen
data.mechanic: Incapacitated. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage. Automatically Dexterity saving throws. Unless otherwise stated, lasts 1 turn.

data.name: Grappled
data.mechanic: Speed becomes 0. Ends if grappler becomes incapacitated or an effect removes the grappler beyond melee range of the creature.

data.name: Invisible
data.mechanic: Impossible to see without special gadgets. The creature still makes noise and tracks. Attack rolls against the creature have disadvantage. The creature has advantage on attack rolls.

data.name: Lifted
data.mechanic: Restrained. A lifted target has no mass, lifted into the air by a temporary mass effect field. Thus, a lifted creature can be pushed, pulled, or otherwise manipulated for varying results.

data.name: Paralyzed
data.mechanic: Incapacitated. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage. Automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws. Any attack that hits made within melee range (2m) is a critical hit."

data.name: Petrified
data.mechanic: Incapacitated. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage. Automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws. Resistance to all damage. Immune to poison and disease.

data.name: Poisoned
data.mechanic: Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

data.name: Prone
data.mechanic: Can crawl. Condition ends if the creature stands up (takes 1/2 movement). Has disadvantage on attack rolls. Attacks against the creature made within 2m have advantage, beyond 2m disadvantage.

data.name: Restrained
data.mechanic: Speed becomes 0. Attack rolls have disadvantage. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage. Disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws.

data.name: Stunned
data.mechanic: Incapacitated. Automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage.

data.name: Targeting
data.mechanic: Speed is reduced by half. Automatically fail Dexterity saving throws. Creatures that attack the creature have advantage.

data.name: Unconscious
data.mechanic: Incapacitated. Drops any weapons. Fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage. Any attack within 2m that hits is a critical hit.

data.name: Unprotected
data.mechanic: Has no shield points or barrier ticks.
